General.Name: Ilji Technology Co. Ltd
General.Description: Ilji Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells car body parts and cutting edge molds in South Korea and internationally. The company was formerly known as Shina Machinery Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Ilji Technology Co., Ltd. in July 1997. Ilji Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Gyeongju-si, South Korea.
